MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:31pm. Our emergency response team are on their way to the Penninghame Home Farm substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:15pm on Monday, 19 April 2021
